pullrequest.title: GetName() is deprecated, changed to Name()

content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution, @MichaelSzer ! 

It looks like `World::Name()` [is not](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/6c3209d9404e8f77e9e0538a6c661a67e984a68a/gazebo/physics/World.hh?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default#World.hh-116) on Gazebo 7 and was [introduced](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/0a80f10918576cf1fc4787ebb6f1b9cb424a0c8b/gazebo/physics/World.hh?at=gazebo8&fileviewer=file-view-default#World.hh-134) on Gazebo 8, do you mind retargetting your pull request to the `gazebo8` branch? Thanks!
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution, @MichaelSzer !

It looks like World::Name() is not on Gazebo 7 and was introduced on Gazebo 8, do you mind retargetting your pull request to the gazebo8 branch? Thanks!
